# Recalibrate

> AI-powered chronic pain and allied health management platform built from 5 years of lived experience with fibromyalgia. Launching on iOS, Android and Web in Q1 2026.

## Pages
- [Home](https://recalibratepain.com): Platform overview, app waitlist and ecosystem hub
- [Features](https://recalibratepain.com/features): Smart Tracker, Analytics Dashboard, Pain Science Academy, Recalibrate AI, Tools & Exercises, Care Team
- [Pricing](https://recalibratepain.com/pricing): Free, Go ($12.99/mo), Pro ($34.99/mo), Super ($59.99/mo), Lifetime ($999.99)
- [Blog](https://recalibratepain.com/blog): 10+ evidence-based articles on pain science, sleep, mindfulness, fibromyalgia and self-management
- [Resources](https://recalibratepain.com/resources): Free courses, downloadable guides, community support
- [Partners](https://recalibratepain.com/partners): Allied health clinics, research collaborations, investor opportunities
- [Self-Management 101](https://recalibratepain.com/recalibrate101): Free 8-module chronic pain course (PDF, no signup)
- [Recalibrate Protocol](https://recalibratepain.app/protocol): Standalone clinical product â€” 50+ protocols across 8 biological systems, $149.99 lifetime access

## Product
Recalibrate is a comprehensive allied health platform for patients managing chronic pain, chronic illness, and complex health conditions. It combines 18+ metric health tracking, a Pain Science Academy with 100+ evidence-based lessons, AI-powered health insights (Recalibrate AI), therapeutic tools (journaling, CBT, mindfulness, goal tracking), medication tracking, and a connected care team for clinicians and family.

Serves three user types: Patients, Allied Health Clinicians (physiotherapists, occupational therapists, chiropractors, psychologists, dietitians), and Carers/Family.

## Recalibrate Protocol
The Recalibrate Protocol is a standalone science-based product addressing root biological causes of chronic pain across 8 systems: Digestive, Endocrine, Sleep, Immune, Autonomic, Neural, Musculoskeletal and Cognitive. Includes 50+ protocols, 8-day email course, quick reference guides and 250+ research paper directory. One-time payment $149.99 (was $300). URL: https://recalibratepain.app/protocol
